title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2002, Van Susteren switched to the Fox News Channel after a highly publicized contract-bidding war. Before starting at Fox she also underwent cosmetic surgery that significantly changed her look. She hosted the current affairs show On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren.

title: Greta Van Susteren: MSNBC Only Network That Ever Tried to Control My Show | Barrett Media
snippet: “I almost thought they were joking because I had like a 15 or 18-year career in the news business and nobody ever told me and so it never occurred to me.” ... Greta Van Susteren had previously worked at both CNN and Fox News before joining MSNBC.

title: Greta Van Susteren Net Worth 2025 - The Surprising Figure - Mac Issues
snippet: During her 14-year tenure at the network, Van Susteren reportedly commanded an annual salary that peaked at around $7 million for hosting “On the Record with Greta Van Susteren.” This long-running show became a cornerstone of Fox’s evening lineup, significantly bolstering her wealth.

title: Greta Van Susteren - Biography - IMDb
snippet: Greta Van Susteren. Actress: Notorious. Born in Appleton, Wisconsin, Greta Van Susteren was awarded a Bachelor's degree with Distinction in Economics from the University of Wisconsin in 1976. In 1979, she was awarded a law degree and, in 1982, a master of laws in trial advocacy from Georgetown Law Center, serving as a civil and criminal attorney in Wisconsin for several years.

title: Greta Van Susteren – USC Center on Communication Leadership and Policy
snippet: Prior to Fox, Greta worked at CNN for 7 years where she started out as a legal analyst then became co-host of CNN’s daily legal program Burden of Proof. She went on to host the channel’s prime time news and analysis show The Point with Greta Van Susteren.
